channel.title: Welcome message
channel.description: So i downloaded the TrisdiaX source n client, and im trying to code and stuff but when i try to change the welcome messages i have no idea where to do that. I go to client.java and search public void welcomemessage or i try ctrl + f keywords of the welcome messages to try and find it but i have no idea where it is. Any help is welcomed thanks

item.title: Welcome message
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

TrisidiaX-Announcement1=
Keep that part.
And add whatever you want after the = sign.
The <col=255> Makes the text color blue, and the <shad=15695415> makes the text have some shade (idk the color).
<img=2> is a crown (mod icon).
The colors and shades use the decimal system to get it’s color.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome message
item.dc:creator: @BrandonRSPS BrandonRSPS
item.description:
@BrandonRSPS wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:543785”]It’s going to be in the announcements.ini file
But knowing trisidia, he named the announcements something like
"TrisidiaXAnnouncements.ini"[/quote]
It’s still called Announcements.ini, although inside the file is different.

[Announcements]
TrisidiaX-Announcement1= <col=255><shad=15695415>	<img=2>Welcome to TrisidiaX!<img=2>
TrisidiaX-Announcement2= <shad=40960> <img=4>Only donate to Trisidia!<img=4>
TrisidiaX-Announcement3=

Read full topic
